forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Scattered showers and thunderstorms. High 13C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mixed clouds and sun with scattered thunderstorms. High around 55F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this evening, becoming a steady rain overnight. Low 8C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 46F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.
